alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Durham; Johnston; Orange; Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 8:38PM EDT until May 06 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Orange County in central North Carolina... Wake County in central North Carolina... Johnston County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Chatham County in central North Carolina... Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 837 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Raleigh, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Durham, Cary, Chapel Hill, Smithfield, Wake Forest, Garner, Carrboro, Fuquay-Varina and Clayton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina. Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central North Carolina.
